TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SendMessageChannelCache extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class SendMessageChannelCache Implements IDisposable
public ref class SendMessageChannelCache sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: 表示一个扩展，可以实现缓存共享级别的自定义、通道工厂缓存的设置，以及使用 消息传递活动将消息发送给服务终结点的工作流通道缓存的设置。

span.span: Represents an extension that enables the customization of the cache sharing levels, the settings of the channel factory cache, and the settings of the channel cache for workflows that send messages to service endpoints using messaging activities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类适用于将消息发送给服务终结点的工作流。This class is intended for workflows that send messages to service endpoints. 这些工作流通常是客户端工作流，但也可以是在 中承载的工作流服务。These workflows are typically client workflows but could also be workflow services that are hosted in a . 默认情况下，在 承载的工作流中，由 消息传递活动使用的缓存可在 中的所有工作流实例中共享（主机级缓存）。By default, in a workflow hosted by a , the cache used by messaging activities is shared across all workflow instances in the (host-level caching). 对于未由 承载的客户端工作流，缓存仅对该工作流实例可用（实例级缓存）。For a client workflow that is not hosted by a , the cache is available only to the workflow instance (instance-level caching). 对于已在配置中定义了终结点的工作流中的所有 Send 活动，默认情况下为禁用缓存。Caching is disabled by default for any send activity in your workflow that has endpoints defined in configuration. 有关如何更改通道工厂和通道缓存的默认缓存共享级别和缓存设置的详细信息，请参阅[更改发送活动的缓存共享级别](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/changing-the-cache-sharing-levels-for-send-activities)。For more information about how to change the default cache sharing levels and cache settings for the channel factory and channel cache, see [Changing the Cache Sharing Levels for Send Activities](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/changing-the-cache-sharing-levels-for-send-activities). ## Examples 下面的示例演示了如何使用 类在一个应用程序域中的两个工作流应用程序之间共享通道缓存。The following example shows how to use the class to share a channel cache between two workflow applications in a single app domain. [!code-csharp[ChannelCache#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/channelcache/cs/client.cs#0)]

summary.span: 使用自定义的工厂缓存和通道缓存设置初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with custom factory cache and channel cache settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关通道工厂的更多信息，请参见 和 。For more information about channel factories, see and . 通过将 `channelSettings` 参数传递给已初始化为 实例（ 值为 0）的这个构造函数，您可以选择只使用通道工厂缓存并禁用通道缓存。You can choose to use only the channel factory cache and disable the channel cache by passing the `channelSettings` parameter to this constructor initialized to a instance with a value of 0. 要完全禁用通道工厂缓存和通道缓存的缓存，请将 `factorySettings` 参数传递给已初始化为 实例（ 值为 0）的这个构造函数。To disable the cache completely for both the channel factory cache and the channel cache, pass the `factorySettings` parameter to this constructor initialized to a instance with a value of 0. 注意：您不能在通道工厂缓存禁用时启用通道缓存。Note that you cannot turn the channel cache on if the channel factory cache is disabled. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了如何使用 类在一个应用程序域中的两个工作流应用程序之间共享通道缓存。The following example shows how to use the class to share a channel cache between two workflow applications in a single app domain. [!code-csharp[ChannelCache#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/channelcache/cs/client.cs#0)]

summary.span: 使用自定义的工厂缓存设置、自定义的通道缓存设置和一个指示是否启用缓存的值初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with custom factory cache settings, custom channel cache settings, and a value that indicates whether to turn caching on.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，缓存仅适用于 不使用配置中定义的终结点的活动。By default, the cache is only available for activities that don't use endpoints defined in configuration. 但是，如果要在此情况下启用缓存，请在参数设置为的情况下调用此构造函数 `allowUnsafeCaching` `true` 。However, if you want to turn caching on in this case call this constructor with the `allowUnsafeCaching` parameter set to `true`. 接下来，将此类的新实例作为扩展添加到工作流服务主机或工作流实例。Next, add the new instance of this class as an extension to a workflow service host or a workflow instance. 有关通道工厂的更多信息，请参见 和 。For more information about channel factories, see and .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用缓存。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to turn caching on.

value.span: 要开启缓存，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果工作流中的 活动已在配置缓存中定义了终结点，缓存会变得不安全，因此会默认禁用缓存。If the activity in your workflow has endpoints defined in configuration caching could be unsecure and therefore is disabled by default. 但是，如果要启用缓存，请将此属性设置为 `true` 。However, if you want to turn caching on set this property to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通道工厂缓存表示缓存的通道工厂。The channel factory cache represents cached channel factories. 有关通道工厂的更多信息，请参见 和 。For more information about channel factories, see and .
